content.text1: When’s the last time someone asked you what you believe? You know—about the big things in life. We’re a church that loves to ask questions, and loves people with questions. We don’t have all the answers, but exploring together is pretty much our favourite thing.
Community is a party and we want to make sure everyone's invited. Ready to connect with people who want to do this together?

image1.alt: Group of friends from church sitting together, and talking.

content.text1: We're beginning the next chapter of our story to go and engage people who have never meaningfully encountered the message of Jesus. COVID-19 has impacted the plans we had and so we've made some necessary changes.

image1.alt: Group of friends sitting outside and having spiritual conversations.

content.text1: Explore the life and teaching of Jesus as well as practical applications for your daily life.

list.title: Sunday Teaching
list.text: All of our teaching videos and series, including notes, questions, audio, and additional content. Check out what we're learning, or find what you're looking for in our video playlists.
list.imageAlt: Young woman sitting at a table and looking at her notes from Sunday teaching at The Meeting House.

list.title: Livestream
list.text: We're live every Sunday at 10:00am EDT. A one hour livestream experience with stories, music, and teaching. If you're looking for a good first step, this is it. See you this Sunday!
list.imageAlt: Screen shot of Bruxy teaching during Sunday morning livestream at The Meeting House.

list.title: Podcasts
list.text: All of our Sunday teaching in one place. We've also got The After Party podcast where we chat with special guests about theology and culture and The Roundtable podcast where we discuss church life with our leaders, staff, and special guests.
list.imageAlt: Team of pastors from The Meeting House sitting around a table and recording a podcast.

list.title: Kids & Youth Curriculum
list.text: Through Sunday morning teaching, midweek group resources, and The Parent Blog, our kids and youth curriculum is designed to partner with parents and leaders and equip them with resources to disciple their kids and youth well.
list.imageAlt: Kids gathering around a smartphone to watch a video from The Meeting House Kids and Youth curriculum.

content.text1: Volunteering, giving, and compassion around the block or around the world. We want to use our money, time, and resources to love and serve people on the margins. Are you looking to get involved?

image1.alt: Friends walking together across the street talking about volunteering, compassion, and giving at The Meeting House.

content.text1: We've made significant changes in response to the COVID-19 pandemic. Whether you're a new visitor or an old timer, find out what's changing at The Meeting House as we head into the fall.

image1.alt: A woman wearing a mask looking directly at the camera.
A young woman is talking to her friends in the church lobby.

content.text2: Taking all this in can feel pretty overwhelming. Drop your email below and we'll send you some of our favourite starting content and suggest a practical next step.

image1.alt: A map representing locations of The Meeting House churches.

content.text1: It's pretty simple: we get together to build relationships, and find ways to love and serve our neighbourhoods as we learn to follow Jesus.
